title: Jack Perry Thought He Was Only Going To Be Off A Month Or Two Following AEW Full Gear 2024

title: AEW Sets Date For Return Of Blood & Guts On Dynamite, Same Night As Local GWAR Concert
summary: AEW's most violent stipulation is making its return this November as the company has officially announced a date for this year's Blood and Guts event.

title: AEW Announces Return Of Blood And Guts
